scripts.deploy:cloudflare: npm run build:cloudflare && npm run prepare:cloudflare-deploy && npx wrangler pages deploy .open-next/cloudflare-deploy --project-name=clases-bot
scripts.prepare:cloudflare-deploy: rm -rf .open-next/cloudflare-deploy && mkdir -p .open-next/cloudflare-deploy && cp -r .open-next/cloudflare/* .open-next/cloudflare-deploy/ && cp -r .open-next/server-functions .open-next/cloudflare-deploy/ && cp -r .open-next/middleware .open-next/cloudflare-deploy/ && cp -r .open-next/.build .open-next/cloudflare-deploy/ && cp .open-next/worker.js .open-next/cloudflare-deploy/_worker.js && cp .open-next/_routes.json .open-next/cloudflare-deploy/_routes.json 2>/dev/null || echo '{"version":1,"include":["/*"],"exclude":[]}' > .open-next/cloudflare-deploy/_routes.json
